title: This softshell turtle hung out with T. rex and triceratops
content: A newly discovered fossil belongs to a softshell turtle that lived alongside Tyrannosaurus rex and triceratops in North Dakota 66.5 million years ago.
description: A newly discovered fossil belongs to a softshell turtle that lived alongside Tyrannosaurus rex and triceratops in North Dakota 66.5 million years ago.
